checklistDescription: TODO Items for PIF transfer to 18F.

dayZero.displayName: Date that PIF decides to Transition
dayZero.description: Date that PIF decides to transition (9th or 10th month).

pifConveysInterest.description: PIF takes to director of team they would like to join in their 9th or 10th month.

sqaLetterForPIF.displayName: Nathan fills out SQA Letter if necessary and sends to Talent Team

conveyInformationToTalent.displayName: Conveys location information to Talent POC
conveyInformationToTalent.description: Nathan will inform the talent team and the correct POC as soon as they're official.

pifBecomesOfficial.displayName: PIF Becomes official and has start date

informsOpsAnd18F.description: Talent notifies Ops about the new hire and lets #newsletter know for official inclusion in the 18F internal newsletter.

addToPIFListserv.description: Nathan will add new PIFs to the PIF listserv and Shawnique will add new hires to the 18F Listserv.

followNewHireChecklist.displayName: Follow Talent's new hire checklist for additional steps
